channel.title: Comments on: RegaMaster Center Caps and Spoke Decals

item.title: By: Alex
item.dc:creator: Alex
item.description: Are those extra center caps for sale? I need 4 black ones. You can find me on FB on the RX7 group “Alexander Ivanov”
item.content:encoded: Are those extra center caps for sale? I need 4 black ones. You can find me on FB on the RX7 group “Alexander Ivanov”

item.title: By: Lamar A.
item.dc:creator: Lamar A.
item.description: Hey Eric, any chance you still check the email threads here? If you still have a set of the center caps would definitely love to make a new home for them :) Thanks!
item.content:encoded: Hey Eric, any chance you still check the email threads here? If you still have a set of the center caps would definitely love to make a new home for them :) Thanks!

item.title: By: Rob B.
item.dc:creator: Rob B.
item.description: Interested in printing my own decals for my 18"-ers too. Would you be willing to share your art? Would like the decals you showed and if you have a hi-res scan of your center caps so I can make center cap stickers (can't afford real caps so I'll make my own). Nice job and Thanks!!!!
item.content:encoded: Interested in printing my own decals for my 18″-ers too. Would you be willing to share your art? Would like the decals you showed and if you have a hi-res scan of your center caps so I can make center cap stickers (can’t afford real caps so I’ll make my own). Nice job and Thanks!!!!

item.title: By: Dan
item.dc:creator: Dan
item.description: Love your car, and great choice of wheels! I actually just picked up a set of 18x9.5 +18 Marquis Promadas off Yahoo Auctions myself, but they didn't come with center caps... Would you be at all willing to part with 4 of yours? :)
item.content:encoded: Love your car, and great choice of wheels! I actually just picked up a set of 18×9.5 +18 Marquis Promadas off Yahoo Auctions myself, but they didn’t come with center caps… Would you be at all willing to part with 4 of yours? :)

item.title: By: Andrew
item.dc:creator: Andrew
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2017/02/regamaster-center-caps-and-spoke-decals/#comment-435850">Eric</a>.
I figured, oh well, gonna just run them anyways. :(
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Eric.

I figured, oh well, gonna just run them anyways. :(

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2017/02/regamaster-center-caps-and-spoke-decals/#comment-435846">Andrew</a>.
If it's oxidized in between the caps, there's not a whole lot you can do. I just polished my caps to make minor swirls and scratches better.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Andrew.

If it’s oxidized in between the caps, there’s not a whole lot you can do. I just polished my caps to make minor swirls and scratches better.

item.title: By: Andrew
item.dc:creator: Andrew
item.description: so pretty, lol, does the buffing and polish take care of the center caps? my center cap oxidation seems to be in between the plastic and logo, if that make sense.
item.content:encoded: so pretty, lol, does the buffing and polish take care of the center caps? my center cap oxidation seems to be in between the plastic and logo, if that make sense.
